subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Shameka Christon scored 24 points and Janel McCarville had 22 points and 10 rebounds to lead the visiting Liberty to an 86-76 victory against the Atlanta Dream in the W.N.B.A.
snippet: Shameka Christon scored 24 points and Janel McCarville had 22 points and 10 rebounds to lead the visiting Liberty to an 86-76 victory against the Atlanta Dream in the W.N.B.A.
